attributes.action: consider the public purse monies being used to research effect of climate change
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although we are all aware of so called "problems" in climate change, being bombarded almost daily by media on the damage being done to the environment ( I recently read about the Report conducted by a committee of world wide "experts" who think {emphasis on think}the world temp will increase by 2-3 degrees by the end of the Century when weather snt be forecasted for the week ahead!). The Govt needs to be transparent on how much is being fed into these Research Groups when the money could be put to more practical use to combat emmissions etc. How much is being fed into Research & how can the "woolly" report results be justified ? Spend tax payers money more usefully !
